Explanation: More descriptive name and reduces confusion for players coming to the game from a different rules set that uses the term.
Changed to avoid confusion between “level” and “level.”
Changed to avoid overlap with focus spells.
Negative damage and the negative trait are now “void” to reflect their meaning in the game world and avoid confusing wording when doing math.
Positive damage and the positive trait are now “vitality” to reflect their meaning in the game world and avoid confusing wording when doing math.
Sets of tools you can wear are called toolkits to make it more clear which items are eligible to be worn.
